item.title: Ansible AWX
item.description: install latest ansible apt-add-repository ppa:ansible/ansible [ENTER] apt update apt-get install ansible install latest docker apt-add-repository ppa:ansible/ansible [ENTER] apt update apt-get install ansible curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add - add-apt-repository \ "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu \ $(lsb_release -cs) \ stable" apt update apt-get install docker-ce apt install make apt install python-pip pip install docker pip install --upgrade pip apt install git curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/geerlingguy/awx-container/master/docker-compose.yml docker-compose up -d tunggu beberapa saat lalu akses via http, misal http://localhost dengan user admin/password

item.title: TODO web page monitoring and alert when change
item.description: Finally it using ariya phantomjs , combine with bash script and run in cron every 9 minuteshttp://phantomjs.org/screen-capture.html http://phantomjs.org/related-projects.html https://github.com/superbrothers/capturejs https://github.com/hggh/phantomjs-screenshots https://github.com/astefanutti/decktape https://github.com/sindresorhus/pageres http://bhfsteve.blogspot.co.id/2013/03/monitoring-web-page-for-changes-using.html?m=1http://changedetection.com/https://visualping.iohttps://visualping.io/chrome-app (free forever)https://www.npmjs.com/package/page-monitorhttp://cabotapp.com/https://blog.newrelic.com/2013/06/04/simpler-ui-testing-with-casperjs-2/https://ghostinspector.comhttps://dzone.com/articles/automated-regression-testing-made-easy-with-casper
